changeSet.id: Added Payment method ACH for test case
changeSet.author: Usman Malik

delete.where: task_id in (select id from pluggable_task where type_id= (select max(id) from pluggable_task_type where class_name ='com.sapienter.jbilling.server.pluggableTask.PaymentFakeTask'))
type_id=(select max(id) from pluggable_task_type where class_name ='com.sapienter.jbilling.server.pluggableTask.PaymentFakeTask')

changeSet.author: Usman Malik
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO pluggable_task (id, entity_id, type_id, processing_order, optlock) select (select max(p.id)+1 from pluggable_task p) + (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id), e1.id, (select max(id) from pluggable_task_type ptt where ptt.class_name='com.sapienter.jbilling.server.payment.tasks.PaymentPaypalExternalTask'), 1, 1 from entity e1 order by e1.id

INSERT INTO pluggable_task_parameter (id, task_id, name, str_value, optlock) select (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id) + coalesce((select max(id)+1 from pluggable_task_parameter), 1), pt.id, 'PaypalUserId', 'paypal-facilitator_api1.answerconnect.com', 1 from entity e1, pluggable_task pt where e1.id = pt.entity_id and e1.deleted = 0 and pt.type_id = (select max(ptt.id) from pluggable_task_type ptt where ptt.class_name='com.sapienter.jbilling.server.payment.tasks.PaymentPaypalExternalTask');

INSERT INTO pluggable_task_parameter (id, task_id, name, str_value, optlock) select (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id) + coalesce((select max(id)+1 from pluggable_task_parameter), 1), pt.id, 'PaypalPassword', '1398095235', 1 from entity e1, pluggable_task pt where e1.id = pt.entity_id and e1.deleted = 0 and pt.type_id = (select max(ptt.id) from pluggable_task_type ptt where ptt.class_name='com.sapienter.jbilling.server.payment.tasks.PaymentPaypalExternalTask');

INSERT INTO pluggable_task_parameter (id, task_id, name, str_value, optlock) select (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id) + coalesce((select max(id)+1 from pluggable_task_parameter), 1), pt.id, 'PaypalSignature', 'AT9-1shSE4saHFiVmaoZMYRy-uuGA5ct7uBfzjbeO97zJFKlDLC6BLNw', 1 from entity e1, pluggable_task pt where e1.id = pt.entity_id and e1.deleted = 0 and pt.type_id = (select max(ptt.id) from pluggable_task_type ptt where ptt.class_name='com.sapienter.jbilling.server.payment.tasks.PaymentPaypalExternalTask');

INSERT INTO pluggable_task_parameter (id, task_id, name, str_value, optlock) select (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id) + coalesce((select max(id)+1 from pluggable_task_parameter), 1), pt.id, 'PaypalEnvironment', 'sandbox', 1 from entity e1, pluggable_task pt where e1.id = pt.entity_id and e1.deleted = 0 and pt.type_id = (select max(ptt.id) from pluggable_task_type ptt where ptt.class_name='com.sapienter.jbilling.server.payment.tasks.PaymentPaypalExternalTask');

changeSet.author: Usman Malik
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO pluggable_task (id, entity_id, type_id, processing_order, optlock) select (select max(p.id)+1 from pluggable_task p) + (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id), e1.id, (select max(id) from pluggable_task_type ptt where ptt.class_name='com.sapienter.jbilling.server.payment.tasks.SaveCreditCardExternallyTask'), 7, 1 from entity e1 order by e1.id

INSERT INTO pluggable_task_parameter (id, task_id, name, str_value, optlock) select (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id) + coalesce((select max(id)+1 from pluggable_task_parameter), 1), pt.id, 'contactType', '10', 1 from entity e1, pluggable_task pt where e1.id = pt.entity_id and e1.deleted = 0 and pt.type_id = (select max(ptt.id) from pluggable_task_type ptt where ptt.class_name='com.sapienter.jbilling.server.payment.tasks.SaveCreditCardExternallyTask');

INSERT INTO pluggable_task_parameter (id, task_id, name, str_value, optlock) select (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id) + coalesce((select max(id)+1 from pluggable_task_parameter), 1) as id, pt.id as pt_id, 'externalSavingPluginId', ex.id, 1 from entity e1, pluggable_task pt,pluggable_task ex where e1.id = pt.entity_id and e1.deleted = 0 and pt.type_id = (select max(ptt.id) from pluggable_task_type ptt where ptt.class_name='com.sapienter.jbilling.server.payment.tasks.SaveCreditCardExternallyTask') and ex.type_id = (select max(pty.id) from pluggable_task_type pty where pty.class_name='com.sapienter.jbilling.server.payment.tasks.PaymentPaypalExternalTask') and e1.id = ex.entity_id and e1.deleted = 0;

INSERT INTO pluggable_task_parameter (id, task_id, name, str_value, optlock) select (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id) + coalesce((select max(id)+1 from pluggable_task_parameter), 1), pt.id, 'obscureOnFail', '1', 1 from entity e1, pluggable_task pt where e1.id = pt.entity_id and e1.deleted = 0 and pt.type_id = (select max(ptt.id) from pluggable_task_type ptt where ptt.class_name='com.sapienter.jbilling.server.payment.tasks.SaveCreditCardExternallyTask');

INSERT INTO pluggable_task_parameter (id, task_id, name, str_value, optlock) select (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id) + coalesce((select max(id)+1 from pluggable_task_parameter), 1), pt.id, 'removeOnFail', '1', 1 from entity e1, pluggable_task pt where e1.id = pt.entity_id and e1.deleted = 0 and pt.type_id = (select max(ptt.id) from pluggable_task_type ptt where ptt.class_name='com.sapienter.jbilling.server.payment.tasks.SaveCreditCardExternallyTask');
